name: There Can Be Only One
description:
This game was made for the gmtk game jam 2019. The theme was: only one.

So here is a fighting game where ONLY ONE player can survive^^

There will be a video to the game jam soon on my youtube channel, so subscribe:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbUldyJ0W-7B8spckDewC9g

You are a gladiator in an arena together with 10 other ones. Your goal is to reduce the health bars of the others to 0 and win the game. You can move with the arrow keys and attack with the button: 1. Corpses also inflict damage, if they are punch at you, so use them also weapeons. You will soon realize the tnt which explodes when it's punched at something.

Have fun^^
